about_the_game:
After a huge change, you will play the role of the white-haired girl protagonist Via, travel through the rifts of the dimension, and explore the dark and terrifying dungeon. You must capture the souls of monsters, collect equipment, save teammates, and solve puzzles in person to know your identity and save the fate of the planet!

This is a visual role-playing game that enhances costume collection, monster cultivation, and strategic combat on the basis of traditional RPG. You can see the shadow of the following games: Chrono Trigger, Trails series, Diablo series, Heroes of Might and Magic series, etc.

The full version will include:

* A total of five chapters of plot content.

* A total of more than 150 types of monsters, all of which can become teammates.

* A total of more than 300 wearable equipment, and support visualization.

* More exquisite CG, if this can attract you, please leave me a message or private message, thank you very much for your support.

name: 维雅：苍刻之空

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
